Class CLILargeSideRepresentation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.cli.rendering.common.side.CLISideRepresentation
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.cli.rendering.common.side.CLILargeSideRepresentation
public class CLILargeSideRepresentation extends CLISideRepresentation
Represents a side of a card in the CLI-rendered game field.
